pages.text: An all-purpose Witcher's armour, given to the Witchers of Kaer Morhen.$(br2)$(l)SET BONUS: $(o)While holding a $(a)Contract $(0)or $(a)Trophy $(0)in your offhand, gain additional armour and slight movement speed.
Turn the page to learn more...

A general Witcher's chestplate suited for travelling and hunting monsters. The first available Witcher armour piece, which serves as the root of all Witcher armour upgrades. Can be upgraded into $(l:weapons_armour/kaer_morhen_set#page_grandmaster_kaer_morhen_chestplate)Grandmaster Kaer Morhen Chestplate.$()

pages.title: Recipe (shaped)
pages.text: Ingredients: $(l:weapons_armour/chainmail_set#page_chainmail_chestplate)Chainmail Chestplate$() x1, $(l:crafting/chainmail#page_chainmail)Chainmail$() x5, and Leather x2

pages.title: Grandmaster K.M. Set
pages.text: A master Witcher's armour, customised for efficiency by a Witcher of Kaer Morhen.$(br2)$(l)SET BONUS: $(o)While holding a $(a)Contract, $(a)Trophy, [Crossbow], $(0)or $(b)[Blade Oil] $(0)in your offhand, gain additional armour and slight movement speed.
Turn the page to learn more...

pages.title: Grandmaster K.M. Chestplate
pages.text: A master Witcher's chestplate suited for travelling and hunting monsters. Can be upgraded into a Witcher chestplate from a specific school.

pages.title: Recipe (smithing)
pages.text: Combine $(l:weapons_armour/kaer_morhen_set#page_kaer_morhen_chestplate)Kaer Morhen Chestplate$() with a Netherite Ingot in a smithing table.
